short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An improved and elegant to-do list Chrome extension with active tab highlighting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay organized and boost your productivity with our minimalist To-Do List Chrome Extension! Designed to seamlessly integrate into your browser, this extension helps you stay on top of your tasks without distractions. Quickly add, edit, and mark off items directly from your new tab page. No sign-ups, no unnecessary featuresâ€”just a simple, intuitive to-do list that keeps you focused on what matters.

Key Features:

Effortlessly add and manage tasks.

Clear, clutter-free design to help you focus.

Automatically saves your progress, ensuring you never miss a task.

Keep your day organized, one task at a time, with this lightweight and effective to-do list extension.
